name: Knockout!!!
description:
controls:

keyboard:

escape key to restart a match

1st player:

WASD, and space bar to move, E to dash.

2nd player:

arrow keys to move, shift to dash,

controllers:

home button to restart a match

1st player and 2nd player :

joystick and a button to move, and X to dash

dash into the other player to deal damage to them.

Knockout is a local multiplayer game where the goal is to knock out the other player by dashing into them. This was made in about 2 days and uses an old game engine, this is a prototype, the game might disappear forever, or might turn into a real game.

music was rushed, so the music might not be that good but you can tell me if it is good or not.
